output_data.clarification_question: What was the total documented duration of the face-to-face psychiatric service (from start to finish)? Time documentation is critical for selecting the correct psychotherapy and E/M codes.
output_data.suggested_answer: 53 minutes (Standard 90837/90838)? Please confirm the exact duration.

primary_code.description: Established patient service combining medication management and psychotherapy.
primary_code.rationale: The established nature of the service, the complexity of managing *Major Depressive Disorder* (F33.1), and the discussion of passive suicidal ideation require billing for both medical management and therapeutic intervention. The final primary code (90834/90837 or 99214/99215) is determined entirely by the documented total time.

output_data.medical_necessity: Service documented management of worsening *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate* (F33.1) involving high complexity medication changes (Sertraline dose increase from 50mg to 100mg) and therapeutic intervention addressing passive suicidal ideation and vegetative symptoms (fatigue, insomnia).
